value:
$WmMPID_アシュ,ch00_39_Ash_F_Normal,Face|To avoid any misunderstanding and
to address the matter as quickly and
directly as possible...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|...Yes?$k$p$WmMPID_アシュ,ch00_39_Ash_F_Normal,Face|The foe we just encountered was
a servant of Embla that goes by the
name Elm. We ought to follow him.$k$pIn all likelihood, he is in the midst
of pursuing some terrible scheme
on the part of Embla.$k$p...If I am mistaken about any of that,
I do sincerely apologize, of course.
But I do not believe that is the case.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|Then our next objective is clear.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|After him!$k$p

$WmMPID_アシュ,ch00_39_Ash_F_Normal,Face|I request you all do your best to stay
on your guard. These soldiers seem
to be under Embla's command.$k$pWere I to venture a guess, I would
say that Embla's retainer, Elm, whom
we saw before... He is in command.$k$pFurthermore, it is also likely—$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|Got it. Pacifying opponents without
killing them is a specialty of ours.
Let's go, everyone!$k$p$Sbs1000|
